import React from 'react' import { useSubscription } from '@apollo/client' import { BOOK_ADDED } from './queries' const Books = ( { show, books } ) => { useSubscription(BOOK_ADDED, { onSubscriptionData: ({ subscriptionData }) => { console.log(subscriptionData) } }) if (!show) { return null } console.log('books', books) const book = books.allBooks console.log('books data', book) return (

books

{book.map(a => )}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Books
